verses.roman:
ebe se jānilāṅ, āra māṭi nā khāiba
kṣudhā lāge yabe, tabe tomāra stana piba"

synonyms: ebe—now; se—that; jānilāṅ—I understand; āra—more; māṭi—dirt; nā—not; khāiba—I shall eat; kṣudhā—hunger; lāge—arises; yabe—when; tabe—at that time; tomāra—your; stana—breast; piba—I shall suck.
translation: "Now that I can understand this philosophy, no more shall I eat dirt. Whenever I am hungry I shall suck your breast and drink your breast's milk."
